sn38.4:1.1: “Kimatthiyam, avuso sariputta, samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
sn38.4:1.2: “Dukkhassa kho, avuso, parinnattham bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti.
sn38.4:1.3: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa dukkhassa parinnaya”ti?
sn38.4:1.4: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etassa dukkhassa parinnaya”ti?
sn38.4:1.5: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etassa dukkhassa parinnaya”ti?
sn38.4:2.1: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa parinnaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.4:2.3: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada etassa dukkhassa parinnaya”ti.
sn38.4:2.4: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etassa dukkhassa parinnaya.
